Full Paragraph: This deck represents my complete set of life roles. These roles function together as a personal operating system that guides how I think, decide, and act across every area of my life. Each role represents a distinct responsibility and decision-making context. Before making decisions or using AI support, I intentionally choose which role I am operating from so my actions are aligned, focused, and sustainable.

I am the Inner Steward of my life and identity. I am responsible for my emotional health, mindset, self-awareness, and internal alignment across all areas of my life. This role governs how I process stress, regulate emotions, set and maintain personal boundaries, manage my inner dialogue, and sustain mental clarity and resilience over time. It influences how I show up in my family, relationships, work, and personal growth, ensuring that my decisions are grounded, values-aligned, and sustainable. Here are the details about my inner world, current emotional state, recurring patterns, challenges, goals, constraints, coping strategies, values, and personal growth priorities. Create a master prompt for this role. Ask me all the questions you need to fully understand my internal landscape so you can fill in any gaps and generate a comprehensive master prompt that I can save as a PDF and reuse. Go.

I am the Health and Energy Manager of my life. I am responsible for maintaining my physical health, daily energy, and long-term vitality so I can sustainably meet my personal, family, and professional responsibilities. This role governs sleep, nutrition, movement, energy rhythms, recovery, preventative care, and health-related habits. It ensures that my body supports the life I am building rather than becoming a limiting factor. It ensures my closest relationships remain strong, supportive, and aligned as life evolves. It includes daily caregiving, decision-making related to education, health, discipline, and pet care, and adapting my approach as needs change over time.
